title: jerry0
author: jerry0
content: Are any available?  Also if so, any safety issue using one from a random?  Saw these codes posted on reddit years ago.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.created_time: April 26, 2023, 01:44:23 PMLast edit: April 26, 2023, 03:07:59 PM by SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: jerry0 on April 24, 2023, 03:46:57 AMAre any available?I checked them on multiple platforms and it appears that there's no ongoing promo that provides a discount code.- It's worth noting that there isn't a secret place for such things, so if you can't find anything, it probably doesn't exist!Quote from: jerry0 on April 24, 2023, 03:46:57 AMAlso if so, any safety issue using one from a random?It depends... If it's hidden behind a button that you have to click so it'd reveal the code, "YES", it's a risky move but if it explicitly mentions the code, I don't think something bad can happen by typing it into the discount code field of Ledger.Quote from: jerry0 on April 24, 2023, 03:46:57 AMSaw these codes posted on reddit years ago.Then it's safe to say that all of them are already expired.Update: Changed can into can't!

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: You can just lurk around this sub since people will usually make a new thread if there is a new price cut or something similar. Not limited to Nano S or any Ledger product too. AFAIK you can also browse around their website since they don't really hide/make their discount a secret thing. Btw, why are you looking for a Nano S plus? IIRC, you already have a Nano S. Have you considered using other wallets or building your own?
